page.title: 15GATESHEAD LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: The{Leisure Centre} was started in {NOVEMBER 1981}. It took two and a half years to build and cost Â£2.5 million. Some of the sports played are squash, badminton,table_tennis,tennis,five_a_ side soccer,volleyball,hockey,pool, snooker,judo,karate,basketball and netball.The centre is open from 8am to 7pm.In the building there is 1 double sized sports hall,1 single sized sports hall,3 function rooms, 1 health spa,1 bar,1 cafe and 5 squash courts. It costs Â£0.5 million to run per year. Forty_five people are employed and it takes the cleaners from 7am to 11am to clean the centre.There are also other activities such as dancing,social functions and meetings.Special facilities for the disabled include lifts,changing rooms,showers and ramps.Unemployed people get concessions if they live in Gateshead.
